name: Green Tea
description: A light and refreshing tea made from unoxidized leaves, rich in antioxidants and known for its health benefits.

name: Black Tea
description: A bold and robust tea made from fully oxidized leaves, perfect for a strong and energizing brew.

name: Herbal Tea
description: A soothing blend of herbs and flowers, caffeine-free and ideal for relaxation.

name: Oolong Tea
description: A traditional Chinese tea with a unique flavor, semi-oxidized and known for its smooth taste.

name: Chamomile Tea
description: A calming tea made from chamomile flowers, often used to aid sleep and reduce stress.
